SINGLE-CHIP FLEXIBLE TIMING  
SOLUTION IS BIG ON FUNCTION  
AND SMALL ON SPACE.
Compact devices that require low-power operation, 
such as digital cameras, smart speakers, virtual reality 
headsets, streaming sticks and set-top boxes, need 
solutions that reduce application size while extending 
battery life. 
Timing devices provide the “heartbeat” in a system. 
Almost all electronic products need reliable and stable 
clocks signal to transmit and process data.  Traditional 
solutions usually include multiple crystals or crystal 
oscillators that consume a lot of board space and power.
Microchip’s DSC613 clock family industry’s smallest 
clock generator, and this single-chip solution can save 
up to 80 percent of board space and help reduce energy 
use.
